title: Revenue And Profit Aren't Mutually Exclusive With Joe Lusardi, Curaleaf CEO - Nasdaq.com
text: Listen on the go! Subscribe to The Cannabis Investing   Podcast on  Apple Podcasts  ,  Google Podcasts  ,  Spotify  , and  Stitcher  .

Today, I am excited to be joined by Joe Lusardi, President & CEO of Curaleaf ( CURLF  ), a vertically integrated multi-state cannabis operator in the U.S. Prior to joining Curaleaf, Joe was principal and founder of Massapoag Advisors and had senior roles at Liberty Mutual and Fidelity Investments.
See also Express: The Long Thesis Looks Intact  on seekingalpha.com
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
